value:
A celebration of the harvest and
togetherness... Surely many benefit
from this festival.

With constant battle comes fatigue.
That is what makes festivals like
these a necessity.

The ratio of people to sweets seems
to be skewed as the treats diminish.
We must prepare more, and quickly.

I, too, can take a form that scares
people. I can show you, if you'd like.

To find such fine festivals, in worlds
not our own...$k$pIt is a shame we cannot always share
such experiences with those whom
we care for most deeply...

Trick or treat. That's the phrase,
correct? Harvest festivities are on
at $Nf's castle.

I hope I was not too scary. To make
up for it, care for some treats?

An obvious trick. Perhaps try
another strategy.

I apologize... It seems the festival
atmosphere has me off balance.

Thank you for your thoughtfulness.
You will reap the rewards.

I am Ena. If this is a harvest festival...
my duty is to spread excitement.
My mission is clear.

Thank you for inviting me to this
festival. It is quite lively.$k$pI believe I have likely lived far longer
than you imagine...$k$pMuch of that life has been consumed
by war and tragedy, and I struggle
to find much that was good in it.$k$pThis festival, in this county, though.
This memory will shine brightly,
with togetherness, joy...celebration.$k$pAs one of the Heroes, I will do my
very best to ensure that this festival
continues for a long time hereafter.
それっ…
止めます
きゃああっ
My sweets...
A trick! Prepare yourself.
Treats, please.
A little fun won't hurt.
Surprised?
Regrettable...
Hehe...
It's the harvest festival, so I've donned a mask.
Oh! So you're trying to trick me?
If the idea is to scare people, I could do that easily... But I feel assuming dragon form may not be in the spirit of the festival.
It's hard to tell who's who when everyone is dressed up.
This world's confections are agreeable... I had not tried them before.
If by joining in I can make people happier, I'll do it.
Thank you for showing me a nice time. I will return the favor one day.
This way?
A difficult decision.
I am sated.
